paper.abstract: It is shown that all two-error correcting Bose-Chaudhuri codes are close-packed and therefore optimum. A method is also given for finding cosets of large weight in t u003e 2-error correcting Bose-Chaudhuri codes, which suggests that no other nontrivial codes are close-packed.
